Field Definition: Resource content type, as indicated through use of bf:Work subclasses.
Recommended Value(s): See LD4L and BF2 Work subclasses.

Expected Value: URI for a madsrdf:Title instance. rdfs:label on the madsrdf:Title instance contains the string for the title. dcterms:language on the Title instance gives the Lexvo URI for the language of the title string.

Field Definition: Classification number representing the subject of the Work.
Expected Value: URI for a bf:Classification instance. Use subclasses of Classification to preliminarily indicate classification scheme/source (i.e. LCC, DDC, etc.)

Field Definition: FRBR-* Expression instance that is an Expression of this bf:Work.
The date the Work originated or was created.
Recommended Value(s): EDTF for the date value. Strongly recommended to include this value.
